arcade.env.grid

Interface Grid

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AgentGrid, HexAgentGrid, RectAgentGrid

    public interface Grid
    A Grid represents the environment for agents.

    Calculations for geometry, bounds, size, etc. can be handled either by the Location object that is passed in with the agent (using the Grid as a container class) or vice versa.

    Since:
    2.2
    Version:
    2.3.0
